description:
If you're a small business owner or social media manager trying to marketing your business online Twitter is one of the fastest growing social networks for growing a community.

If you've got already got a Twitter account you're probably under using it's potential as a powerful tool to attract new leads and customer into your business.

With 25 in depth video tutorials split over 3 sections, this comprehensive course will show you:

  • How to create and design a professional Twitter profile, with downloadable templates inluded.
  • How to craft better tweets and use the 140 character limit more effectively
  • The to 5 reasons why people engage on Twitter
  • How to build a community on Twitter and turn them into leads and prospects for your business
  • How to illustrate your Twitter timeline effectively with images and video
  • How to measure the impact and reach of your Twitter social media marketing
  • How to master the Twitter tools required to grow and maintain a strong long term Twitter community

Enroll on the Twitter Power Marketing training to learn how to master the Twitter social media platform, and all the associated online tools that will help you build a bigger and more targeted Twitter following for your business.
title: Twitter Power Marketing
